section.name: Account Info
section.p: Most of the Ant tasks and tools require your user name and password to work correctly. Since specifying this information each time you invoke a tool/ant task is tedious and insecure, you can write that information in ~/.java.net like this:
proxyServer and proxyPort are optional (but you have to have both if you want to use a proxy.) All the tools and Ant tasks will try to read this file.
On Windows, try running a tool without this file and see the error message to find out where you should place this file.
Make sure to set the permission to 600 to protect your information.
